name: GoalAlert
0:
”Alexa, open Goal Alert”
”Alexa, ask Goal Alert to Add Team”
”Alexa, ask Goal Alert to Remove Team”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: goal alert
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Receive instant goal notifications from any given football match from around the world. 
Just add your favourite team, then whenever a goal is scored in a match featuring your team - Alexa will send you a notification. You will also receive the result when the match ends.

Add 1 team in the free version.

To get started, just add a team:
"Alexa, ask Goal Alert to Add Team."

If you want to remove a team (Premium):
"Alexa, ask Goal Alert to Remove Team."

To hear all the teams you have added:
"Alexa, ask Goal Alert to List Teams."

To remove every team in your list (Premium):
"Alexa, ask Goal Alert to Clear Teams."

When you receive a notification:
"Alexa, play notification" 

If your device has a screen the notification score will appear on-screen.

== Premium version ==
Removes the limit when adding teams, so you can add as many teams as you like. You can also remove teams from your notification list.


* Please ensure you Allow Notifications for Goal Alert in your Alexa App.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
